thread.title: 13 Places Where You Can See the Bluest Water in the World
thread.title_full: 13 Places Where You Can See the Bluest Water in the World

author: spearmac
title: 13 Places Where You Can See the Bluest Water in the World
text:
13 Places Where You Can See the Bluest Water in the World 
Don’t forget your camera! 
Getty Images/iStockphoto by Melissa Locker 
Sometimes all it takes to re-center and refresh your mind and body is a good day (or week—who are we to limit you) staring off into a tranquil blue sea. 
To help you find your inner peace, and catch a few waves and rays while you’re at it, we’ve put together a list of some of the bluest waters in the world. These lakes, seas, beaches, and bays have vistas that range from brilliant navy blues to the lightest, clearest turquoises imaginable. Needless to say, they are the perfect places to re-connect with nature, family, and yourself. Scroll Down
